actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-238, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 99.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of H.R. 2861 (FY 2004 Departments of Veterans Affairs and of Housing and Urban Development and independent agencies appropriations).

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
